text: [Music]
my name is Gregory Scallan I am Chief
Architect at Flipboard Flipboard is
based in paloalto California we are a
social magazine for iOS devices we
currently serve about 5 million users
and do about 2 billion flips per month
Flipboard pulls in content and photos
that are shared to you from within your
social network networks this information
is provided to you in real time based on
what is happening within those networks
uh and we provide what is deemed the
most relevant information that you are
caring about at that moment we also
present that in a very beautiful
magazine format that you can flip
through very easily so that the
information is very accessible to you we
chose AWS because we wanted the ability
to deploy elastically in the cloud and
to handle ch changes and variances in
the demand of our application and to
handle that when it was needed most
importantly we found this when we
deployed on new devices we would have
millions of new customers online within
a day and deploying in the cloud allowed
us to deploy new machines and support
those new users very quickly we are
using a whole variety of Amazon products
in the cloud we use ec2 to deploy all of
our instances RDS for data storage we
use S3 for storing all of our content
and cloudfront for delivering that
content to our users in the form of
magazines our future plans for working
with AWS includes branching out to
multiple regions as well as employing
some of the newest services that have
been delivered and expanding our
existing Service uh to more users we
have definitely saved on the order of
millions of dollars by running in the
cloud
[Music]
